sentences.english: If the roof drops beads, drops deep pool ding-dong sound, it is called "supernatural spring."
sentences.chinese: 洞顶水滴若珠，滴入深池叮咚作响，名曰“灵异泉”。

sentences.english: The chilly wind bleak, staged a thrilling scene of supernatural events.
sentences.chinese: 阴风惨淡的港府，上演着一幕幕惊心动魄的灵异事件。

sentences.english: Mysterious rites of black magic are celebrated at this tomb.
sentences.chinese: 马克思的墓上曾举行黑魔法的灵异祭仪。

sentences.english: The next morning, the protection is still in the discussion highlights the paranormal.
sentences.chinese: 翌日早上，众学护仍在议论拔萃的灵异遭遇。

sentences.english: Devan believes that strange things happen when there is a full moon.
sentences.chinese: 德凡相信满月时会发生灵异事件。

sentences.english: Water is not deep, the dragon was alien.
sentences.chinese: 水不一定要深，有了龙就灵异了。

definition: sth else/a separate matter/not the same thing/with different jobs (not colleagues)/a remarkable thing/sth special/an odd thing/sth strange or incomprehensible
form of divination similar to the Ouija board, in which participants use their forefingers to push a small saucer over a sheet of paper inscribed with numerous Chinese characters
a form of automatic writing in which two or more participants hold a single pen over a sheet of paper and invite a spirit to write answers to their questions/a spirit so invited
